findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The contract has functions that allow updating or upgrading scripts without proper access control, potentially leading to unauthorized changes.
findings.function: updateAllowedTransfer, updateExemptFee, bulkExemptFee, updateMaxTxLimit, updateMaxWalletlimit, rescueBNB, rescueBEP20, updateTradingEnabled, updateMarketingWallet, updateDevWallet, updateLotteryWallet, updateBuybackWallet, updateCooldown, updateIsBlacklisted, bulkIsBlacklisted

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The owner can mint tokens after initial contract creation/deployment.

findings.title: antiBot
findings.description: The antiBot modifier is used to prevent bots from interacting with certain functions.

findings.title: mutexLock
findings.description: Potential reentrancy vulnerability due to unsecured mutex lock.
